metadata.title: CVE-2021-47409 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:dwc2: check return value after calling platform_get_resource() It willcause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL, we need checkthe return value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1129-azure - 4.15.0-1129.142~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
